title: Ep. 80: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Phoebe Waller-Bridge
description:
Phoebe Waller-Bridge, the creator and star of Amazon's 'Fleabag,' joins Andy Greenwald to discuss comedy, creativity, and breaking the fourth wall.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
